author: Netflix <info@account.netflix.com>
description:
Come back any time to enjoy your favorite TV shows and movies

Your cancellation confirmation

Hi PPP,

As you requested, we've canceled your membership. However,
you can still watch until it ends on Thursday, January 29th,
2026. Restart within 24 months to regain access to your
account information, recommendations and viewing history.
Learn more
[https://help.netflix.com/support/126558?g=a7b23ba5-b6a5-447b-9863-a07ffc6db51e&lkid=URL_DELETE_ACCOUNT&lnktrk=EVO].

We'd love to have you back. If you change your mind, simply
Undo Cancel Request
[https://www.netflix.com/YourAccount?g=a7b23ba5-b6a5-447b-9863-a07ffc6db51e&lkid=URL_RESTART_BODY&lnktrk=EVO&nftoken=Bgi5s%2BvcAxKjAeChiiOjarT%2Fa1m8lM579ccvkZMx5EWdN8SGzXvsWCZxR2I7o80gdSyZrm0cdcS9iPNyku2Q9M99Hz6O3aMX1hcC1wnus71qPVAzGIC1MHDfPCVxoNfyKBaPA6HSrTjR%2FuE%2FcqvuZns58OEZQLPRwyQ2kgC7Y9pRd0l3v60qLkOGD%2F4k%2FeK0W1FC3igzEy1pX5GMVtixocNl2VlyEion8%2B%2BwVG8YBiIOCgx96ibw3BMkCoC%2BHCk%3D]
to enjoy all the best TV shows & movies.
title: We’re sorry to say goodbye
